data.system_settings: Alienware X51 R2, Windows 7 Professional X64
data.actual_result: The user card appears in the middle of discord
data.expected_result: The user card should appear next to the users name on the user list
data.short_description: Clicking add note in mutual friends sometimes puts the user card in the middle of the screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to somebodys profile who you know has one of your friends added - Go to Mutual Friends - Click add note (You may have to do this multiple times since this is inconsistent)
